items.sentence: I didn't know that you could cook so well, Tom.
Some medicines will do you more harm than good.
Why is Tom being so nice to us all of a sudden?
We were paid three thousand dollars to do that.
It would be a shame if the library closed down.
If you don't like what we're doing, then leave.
How would you feel is somebody did that to you?
Tom often spends his spare time reading novels.
We specialize in the import of machinery parts.
Which do you like better, physics or chemistry?
